column4: hi all - got a question: just got ubuntu server installed and by default root login is enabled and sudo is wierd
im reading the ubuntu docs and it says root login should be disabled by default
where did you get that version of ubuntu? because root is disabled by default in ubuntu
ubuntu.com has a nice default ( not broke ) download
you mean download ubuntu to my workstation and copy files off it?
well if you can fix it then do that. or do a fresh install. who knows what else they decided to mess with in the version of ubuntu you got
i cant do a fresh install without them
what are you trying to install?
what are you trying to install?
dont answer me because I might be able to tell you how to install the app without breaking your system
installing a bunch of perl packages
i dont think i have synaptic
